title: Complete Marvel Avengers Comics -part 1 of 5
description:
C O M P L E T E    M A R V E L
AVENGERS    COMICS
Part 1 of 5  


Avengers v1 001-100
Avengers Annuals





Here is the Complete Avengers DVD nicely converted to the
popular .cbz format.  Now you can read these high quality commercial
scans with your favorite comic book viewer software.

These are all complete scans, cover-to-cover, including letters pages,
bullpen bulletins, and all advertisements.  All files have been expertly
converted from .pdf  to .cbz format with single-page images!  No more
double-page images to navigate!  And all are crisp, sharp scans!   If
you have used the commercial DVD, you are sure to appreciate this
improved, user-friendly collection.

This torrent contains:  Avengers v1 1-100 plus all the Avengers Annuals.  
Please download parts 1--5 to get the entire Avengers
Collection which consists of more than 500 issues!















How are these .cbz files better than .pdf?

Unlike the commercial Marvel comic book collections,  these files
employ no use-restriction schemes.  There are  no passwords,
no encryption, no water-marked images.  You are free to view,
copy, extract, print, and manipulate the images.   Also,  all  images
have been split into single pages for easier reading.  A convenient
graphical "covers index" is included to help you find the issues you
want and an informative character bios file is also included.  All
are .cbz files.

These files will work well on any major computing platform,  e.g.
Windows, Linux/Unix, Mac OS-X, and many others.  You can copy
the comics files to your hard drive, laptop, or optical disk.  Because
these comics are in the popular .cbz format, they can now be read
with your favorite comics viewing software.  Unlike the .pdf file
format, the .cbz file format is supported by a wide choice of snappy
viewers offering a multitude of reading enhancement features.  See
the readme file, included in the collection, to learn where to down-
load free .cbz/.cbr comic viewer software.
